description:

Taffy Tales patch v.0.5.2D notes:

• Updated version for Android platform.

• Added new mini-games to gain money and up character corruption.

• Added new character parameters (corruption, immorality).

• Added 2 new unique characters (Natalie, Jennifer).

• Added 2 story beginnings (Natalie, Jennifer).

• Continued 4 stories (Mary, Danny, Becca, Clara).

• Added 1 new location (Jennifer's backyard).

• Added shop for the purchase of items.

• Added new items.

• Added 25+ new scenes with 25+ unique images.

• Added 50+ new short scenes.

• Added 10+ new small talk scenes.

• Added save/load game option.

• Added progress bar to view % of game left to view.

• Added quests menu.

• Added character parameters menu.

• Added confirmation panel to erase saved data, load new data, close the game and etc.

• Improved day count panel.

• Redone dialog box. New font and character assigned colors for easier readability.

• Redone a lot of existing scenes.

• Redone backgrounds (Mary bedroom, bathroom).

• Fixed bug with hiding dialog box.

• Increased time for puzzle mini-game at all stages.

• Fixed character name bug in some diagues.

• Completed a lot of improvements for all game platforms.

• Proofread many in-game scenes. Many thanks to MorahZamora for his huge help with the English corrections!

The previous release from "Taffy Tales" series is here: https://uberpie.itch.io/taffy-tales-version-003b

***Note***
We are looking for writers. 

What can we offer in exchange (we hope it will be interesting to you): 

 -We can add any link to our blog, and game project to your profile, gallery, site, etc 

-Our artist is ready to illustrate your text, draw your scenes and characters.

 -You can use our illustration from this project in your future text if you want to. 

 -We will send you ready illustration from your work during your writing, so you can see results of your effort quickly and before game release. 

We already have detailed plot with scenes, dialogues, description of characters and development of a story. 

But only good writer as you can breathe life into them. 

All this technical task is separated to parts so you can try to take any part you like to make some text anytime (We need any text size so if you don't need to write the whole story if you don't want to.). 

 Also, you can use your older works to bring it life(illustrated) and integrate them into the project. It will be awesome. 

 We hope you find it interesting, thank you!
